alert.note: Alert for Bell; Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 8:45PM CDT until September 24 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Milam County in central Texas... Southeastern Bell County in central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rogers, or 14 miles northeast of Granger, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Little River-Academy, Thorndale, Rogers, Holland, Buckholts, Alcoa Lake, Sparks, Yarrelton, Leedale, Edgeworth, San Gabriel, Sharp, Pettibone, Davilla, and Val Verde. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
